overview:
Toronto based Designer & Developer specializing in cloud-based web applications and sites.

Owns and operates a freelance development and consulting firm in Toronto, Ontario servicing clients in Canada, U.S and Europe. develops across multiple platforms for multiple industries.

Lead Web Developer at BDO Canada, producing data-driven applications and systems in support of Accounting, HR and marketing initiatives.

Owner and developer of new start-up Pegger.ca, a social news site geared towards the production of collaborative news and events content. User-driven, the application is in heavy development and currently preparing for seeking funding to support the continued development and initial push to production of the web application and subsequent systems.
